The following glyphs have no outlines, but this is correct:
Monotype NULL (uni0000)
(uni000D)
SPACE (uni0020)
EN SPACE (uni2002)
HAIR SPACE (uni200A)
NO-BREAK SPACE (uni00A0)
THIN SPACE (uni2009)
ZERO WIDTH SPACE (uni200B)
ZERO WIDTH JOINER (uni200D)
ZERO WIDTH NON-JOINER (uni200C)

Error

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

hmtx

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
237 = 237

Pass

Advance width 'thinspace' 150 is 60% (tolarance 10 units) of 'space' 237.

cmap

uni2008

Advance width of 'PUNCTUATION SPACE' (uni2008) should be equal to the 'period' advance width.

Can not check, because no uni2008 in this font.

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 832

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
237 = 237

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 833

Advance width of 'thinspace' (uni2009) should be smaller than the advance width of 'space' (uni0020).

Advance width 'thinspace' 150 is 60% (tolarance 10 units) of 'space' 237.

Warning

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 831

Advance width of 'hairspace' (uni200A) should be smaller than the advance width of 'space' (uni0020).

Advance width 'hairspace' 60 is smaller than 'space' 237, but should be 30% of space '71.1'. Please verify if this is intend to be like it is.

Info

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

glyf

-/-

Glyphs (LATIN) which are made from components.
Great.

'Aacute' (uni00C1) (ID 5)
'Abreve' (uni0102) (ID 6)
'Acircumflex' (uni00C2) (ID 13)
'Adieresis' (uni00C4) (ID 19)
'Agrave' (uni00C0) (ID 21)
'Amacron' (uni0100) (ID 23)
'Atilde' (uni00C3) (ID 27)
'AEacute' (uni01FC) (ID 29)
'Cacute' (uni0106) (ID 34)
'Ccaron' (uni010C) (ID 35)
'Ccircumflex' (uni0108) (ID 37)
'Cdotaccent' (uni010A) (ID 38)
'Dcaron' (uni010E) (ID 43)
'Dcroat' (uni0110) (ID 44)
'Eacute' (uni00C9) (ID 50)
'Ebreve' (uni0114) (ID 51)
'Ecaron' (uni011A) (ID 52)

glyf

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Info

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

CFF

Composite

CFF font should not have any composite.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Info

CFF

Composite

CFF font should not have any composite.

This is not a CFF font. Skipped this check.

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Advance Width (zero or negative)

Info

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

hmtx

advance

Pull glyphs with advance width zero.

Index 0

OK: Index 0 = ".notdef".

hmtx

Index 0

'.notdef' advance width should not be 0.

OK: '.notdef' advance width is 864.

Pass

post

Index 1

PostScript name should be one of the names:
".null"
"null"
"NULL".

OK: Index 1 = "NULL".

'NULL' shoiuld have no contours.

'NULL' has 0 contours.

OK: 'NULL' has an advance width of 0.

"nonmarkingreturn"

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the sTypo metrics and not usWin metrics the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be True.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag is True.

Error

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

OS/2

WWS

If no NID 21 and 22, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True but is False.

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0000

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0000.

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

'OS/2' usLastCharIndex should be 0xFB02

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0xFB02.

Error

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Installable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

table version 4.

variable font

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

static font

More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

cmap(3, 1, 0) contains U+0000

Pass

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

cmap

cmap(3, 1, 0) contains U+000D

Error

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Merriweather'

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '18'
'Merriweather-Light'

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

but what do think about this

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Eben Sorkin', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Merriweather' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Merriweather Light'.

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
MS is: 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'

Error

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Merriweather'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Merriweather Light'

Error

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 2

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Light'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Regular'

Pass

name

Mac and MS NID 16

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Merriweather'

Error

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

name

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Light'

Pass

Copyright is present.

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '12'
'Merriweather'

Pass

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ex, Sm, Ultra, Xtra, Extra, X, Semi, Demi'

Pass

name/OS/2

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Merriweather'

Error

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Merriweather Light Italic' = NID 1 'Merriweather' + 'space' + NID 2 'Light Italic'

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'Merriweather-LightItalic'

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-LightItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'LightItalic'

Error

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Merriweather is a trademark of Sorkin Type Co.'
but what do think about this
'Merriweather is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Eben Sorkin', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Merriweather' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light Italic' = NID 1 'Merriweather Light' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
MS is: 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'

Error

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Merriweather'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Merriweather Light'

Error

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Italic'

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

NID 4 'Merriweather Regular' ≠ NID 1 'Merriweather'

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'Merriweather-Regular'

Pass

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Merriweather is a trademark of Sorkin Type Co.'
but what do think about this
'Merriweather is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Eben Sorkin', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 1

MS NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '12'
'Merriweather'

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 2.002' does match fontRevision 'Version 2.002'.

Pass

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'Merriweather-Regular'

Pass

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Merriweather is a trademark of Sorkin Type Co.'
but what do think about this
'Merriweather is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Eben Sorkin', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

name

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

Error

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Merriweather Regular (Merriweather-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
MS is: 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'

Pass

NID 6 length is '19'
'Merriweather-Italic'

Pass

Merriweather Italic (Merriweather-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Italic (Merriweather-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Italic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Italic (Merriweather-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Italic (Merriweather-Italic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Merriweather Italic (Merriweather-Italic.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Merriweather Bold (Merriweather-Bold.ttf)

Mac NID 6

Pass

Merriweather Bold (Merriweather-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Bold (Merriweather-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

'Merriweather is a trademark of Sorkin Type Co.'
but what do think about this
'Merriweather is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Merriweather Bold (Merriweather-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Eben Sorkin', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Merriweather Bold (Merriweather-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

name

Error

Merriweather Bold (Merriweather-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Bold (Merriweather-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Merriweather Bold (Merriweather-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 4, Full Font Name' (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

Full Font Name is present.

Pass

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

OK: NID 1 length is '12'
'Merriweather'

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Merriweather Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Merriweather' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'

Pass

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '23'
'Merriweather-BoldItalic'

Pass

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-BoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Merriweather is a trademark of Sorkin Type Co.'
but what do think about this
'Merriweather is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Eben Sorkin', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

name

Mac NID 12

NID 12 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
MS is: 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'

Pass

name

Macintosh NID 0 (Mac/Roman/English)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 0, Copyright' (Mac/Roman/English)

Copyright is present.

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '12'
'Merriweather'

Pass

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ex, Sm, Ultra, Xtra, Extra, X, Semi, Demi'

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Merriweather'

Error

Mac NID 2

NID 2 is 'Black'

'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Merriweather Black' = NID 1 'Merriweather' + 'space' + NID 2 'Black'

Pass

Mac NID 5

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '18'
'Merriweather-Black'

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Mac NID 6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Merriweather is a trademark of Sorkin Type Co.'
but what do think about this
'Merriweather is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Eben Sorkin', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Merriweather' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black' = NID 1 'Merriweather Black'.

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'
MS is: 'Copyright 2016 The Merriweather Project Authors (https://github.com/EbenSorkin/Merriweather), with Reserved Font Name "Merriweather".'

Error

Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Merriweather'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Merriweather Black'

Error

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

Mac NID 6

'Merriweather-BlackItalic'

Pass

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-BlackItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-BlackItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Merriweather is a trademark of Sorkin Type Co.'
but what do think about this
'Merriweather is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'Eben Sorkin', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

NID 11 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

name

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '24'
'Merriweather-BlackItalic'

Pass

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-BlackItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'Merriweather-BlackItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Merriweather is a trademark of Sorkin Type Co.'
but what do think about this
'Merriweather is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Error

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'Eben Sorkin', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

NID 11 is http://sorkintype.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

name

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'Eben Sorkin' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Merriweather' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black Italic' = NID 1 'Merriweather Black' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-75'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Pass

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition is '-75'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

underlineThicknes is '50'.

Pass

Merriweather Bold Italic (Merriweather-BoldItalic.ttf)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-75'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Pass

Merriweather Black Regular (Merriweather-Black.ttf)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-75'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Pass

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

post

underline position and thickness

underlinePosition should be a negative and underlineThickness not 0 or negative.

underlinePosition is '-75'.
underlineThicknes is '50'.

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Error

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

GPOS table does not have kerning feature. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Info

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Pass

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

The font has GPOS kerning.

Info

Merriweather Light Italic (Merriweather-LightItalic.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Info

Font has GPOS kerning and no 'kern' table.
Verify with the spec or PM what is required.

Merriweather Black Italic (Merriweather-BlackItalic.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1257) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Info

gasp

Default

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Pass

Merriweather Light Regular (Merriweather-Light.ttf)

GSUB

sinf

If there is a feature subs, then the sinf feature should be there, too. Otherwise InDesign will mark it not existing.

OK: There is a subs and sinf feature in the font.

Warning
